title: Can't go back to Android 10 stable
content:
Hi
I quit the Android 11 beta program and now I can't go back to Android 10 stable beacause my pixel 4 XL stack on this Fastboot mode alert device state "Locked". 
When I select "Recovery mode" the phone star the system set up but with Android 11 beta intead, no with Android 10.
When the phone is seted up, the new system update for Android 10 notification appears again and is a loop when I can't never get the downgrade. 

Please, I need your help.
Thanks
